page.title: 12SHOPS IN WESTON.
page.content: There are now only{two shops}in Weston but the community is served by several {mobile shops.}The main store is a {general grocery}selling everything from bread to frozen foods, coal and paraffin.This shop also houses the{sub {post office,}there is a savings bank and regular post collection. There are two post ladies for the village but deliveries are made by post office van to outlying hamlets. The other main shop is a{newsagents and hairdressers. {Mobile}vans which supply the area include a{butcher}on Thursday night, a butcher, greengrocer and florist who will deliver from Baldock, and a mobile{fresh fish and frozen goods}van on Wednesdays. Although there is no Chemist locally several inhabitants are willing to collect prescriptions. Their names are displayed in the shop. The other old shop was in Maiden St.
